Arrow (Biotoxin).name: Strzała (Biotoksyna)
Arrow (Biotoxin).description: Ten rodzaj amunicji nie zadaje obrażeń. Zamiast tego cele biologiczne trafione tym atakiem muszą wykonać udany Test Odporności na tortury/narkotyki o PT 15 albo otrzymają 3k6 obrażeń bezpośrednich (bez pancerza). Pancerz nie ulega uszkodzeniu, ponieważ do niczego się nie przydał.

Arrow (Expansive).name: Strzała (Dum-dum)
Arrow (Expansive).description: Gdy ta amunicja spowoduje Ranę Krytyczną Ciało obce, cel rzuca ponownie w tabeli Ran Krytycznych (patrz str. 187), dopóki nie wylosuje rany innej niż Ciało obce. Następnie cel otrzymuje także tę wylosowaną Ranę Krytyczną. Nie zadaje ona kolejnych obrażeń dodatkowych.

Arrow (Incendiary).name: Strzała (Zapalająca)
Arrow (Incendiary).description: Gdy ten typ amunicji po przejściu przez zbroję celu zadaje mu obrażenia, cel zostaje także podpalony. Na koniec każdej swojej Tury otrzymuje 2 punkty obrażeń bezpośrednich (ignorujących pancerz), chyba że wykona Akcję, by ugasić ogień. Efekty tego ataku z kilku źródeł nie kumulują się.

Arrow (Poison).name: Strzała (Zatruta)
Arrow (Poison).description: Ten rodzaj amunicji nie zadaje obrażeń. Zamiast tego cele biologiczne trafione tym atakiem muszą wykonać udany Test Odporności na tortury/narkotyki o PT 13 albo otrzymają 2k6 obrażeń bezpośrednich (bez pancerza). Pancerz nie ulega uszkodzeniu, ponieważ do niczego się nie przydał.

Arrow (Rubber).name: Strzała (Gumowa)
Arrow (Rubber).description: Ta amunicja nie powoduje Ran Krytycznych. Ponadto, pancerz trafionego celu nie ulega uszkodzeniu. Jeśli obrażenia zadane tą amunicją sprawią, że PW celu, który ma więcej niż 1 PW, spadną poniżej 0, zamiast tego cel zostaje na 1 PW. Amunicja Gumowa liczy sie jako standardowa amunicja w przypadku broni egzotycznych.

Arrow (Sleep).name: Strzała (Usypiająca)
Arrow (Sleep).description: Deals no damage. If meat target hit DV13 Resist Torture/Drugs. On fail falls Prone (see pg. 169) and unconscious for 1 minute. Can be woken by damage or another person using an action to touch/shake them.

Arrow (Smart).name: Strzała (Inteligentna)
Arrow (Smart).description: Req Targeting Scope Cyberware, otherwise won't fire. If miss single attack by 4 or less, roll second attack at same DV 1d10+10 (not normal stat). Can add luck. Target can dodge the second roll as normal if able to do so.

Battery Pack.name: Pakiet Baterii
Battery Pack.description: A rechargeable (1 hour) battery pack, commonly used with Exotic weapons. Contains 8 shots and can be recharged.

Grenade (Biotoxin).name: Granat (Biotoksyna)
Grenade (Biotoxin).description: No immediate damage. If hit DV15 Resist Torture/Drugs Check. On a fail 3d6 damage to HP. No Ablation.

Grenade (EMP).name: Granat (EMP)
Grenade (EMP).description: If hit DV15 Cybertech Check. On Fail 2 pieces of Cyberware or carried electronics (GM's choice) stop working for 1 minute. Cyberlimbs hang loosely like a dismembered meat arm see pg. 187.

Grenade (Flashbang).name: Granat (Hukbłyskowa)
Grenade (Flashbang).description: Deals no damage. If hit roll DV15 Resist Torture/Drugs. On a fail take the Damaged Eye and Damaged Ear Critical injuries (see pg. 188) for 1 minute. No Crit damage dealt.

Grenade (Incendiary).name: Granat (Zapalająca)
Grenade (Incendiary).description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Grenade (Poison).name: Granat (Zatruta)
Grenade (Poison).description: No immediate damage. If meat target hit, DV13 Resist Torture/Drugs Check. On a fail 2d6 damage to HP. No Ablation.

Grenade (Sleep).name: Granat (Usypiająca)
Grenade (Sleep).description: Deals no damage. If meat target hit DV13 Resist Torture/Drugs. On fail falls Prone (see pg. 169) and unconscious for 1 minute. Can be woken by damage or another person using an action to touch/shake them.

Grenade (Smoke).name: Granat (Dymna)
Grenade (Smoke).description: Deals no Damage. Fills a 10m/yd x 10m/yd with smoke for 1 minute. Tasks obscured by smoke have a -4 penalty.

Grenade (Teargas).name: Granat (Gaz łzawiący)
Grenade (Teargas).description: Deals no Damage. Hit targets with Meat eyes roll DV13 Resist Torture/Drugs Check. On fail suffer Damaged Eye Critical Injury (See pg. 188) for 1 minute. Does not deal critical bonus damage.

Heavy Pistol (Expansive).name: Ciężki pistolet (Dum-dum)
Heavy Pistol (Expansive).description: If you roll Foreign object Critical (see pg. 187), victim rolls for a second (different) Critical Injury. Second injury does not deal bonus damage.

Heavy Pistol (Incendiary).name: Ciężki pistolet (Podpalająca)
Heavy Pistol (Incendiary).description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Heavy Pistol (Rubber).name: Ciężki pistolet (Gumowa)
Heavy Pistol (Rubber).description: Does not cause Critical Injury. Does not ablate armor. Leaves target at minimum 1hp. Counts as Basic ammo for exotic weapons

Heavy Pistol (Smart).name: Ciężki pistolet (Inteligentna)
Heavy Pistol (Smart).description: Req Targeting Scope Cyberware, otherwise won't fire. If miss single attack by 4 or less, roll second attack at same DV 1d10+10 (not normal stat). Can add luck. Target can dodge the second roll as normal if able to do so.

Medium Pistol (Expansive).name: Średni pistolet (Dum-dum)
Medium Pistol (Expansive).description: If you roll Foreign object Critical (see pg. 187), victim rolls for a second (different) Critical Injury. Second injury does not deal bonus damage.

Medium Pistol (Incendiary).name: Średni pistolet (Podpalająca)
Medium Pistol (Incendiary).description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Medium Pistol (Rubber).name: Średni pistolet (Gumowa)
Medium Pistol (Rubber).description: Does not cause Critical Injury. Does not ablate armor. Leaves target at minimum 1hp. Counts as Basic ammo for exotic weapons

Medium Pistol (Smart).name: Średni pistolet (Inteligentna)
Medium Pistol (Smart).description: Req Targeting Scope Cyberware, otherwise won't fire. If miss single attack by 4 or less, roll second attack at same DV 1d10+10 (not normal stat). Can add luck. Target can dodge the second roll as normal if able to do so.

Paintball (Acid).name: Kulka (Kwas)
Paintball (Acid).description:
Paintballs filled with acid. Deals no damage but ablates armour by 1 SP on hit*.

*Not currently supported so will need to manually reduce armour on hit

Paintball (Basic).name: Kulka (Zwykła)
Paintball (Basic).description: Regular paintballs that don't do any damage. Annoying though.

Rifle (Expansive).name: Karabin (Dum-dum)
Rifle (Expansive).description: If you roll Foreign object Critical (see pg. 187), victim rolls for a second (different) Critical Injury. Second injury does not deal bonus damage.

Rifle (Incendiary).name: Karabin (Podpalająca)
Rifle (Incendiary).description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Rifle (Rubber).name: Karabin (Gumowa)
Rifle (Rubber).description: Does not cause Critical Injury. Does not ablate armor. Leaves target at minimum 1hp. Counts as Basic ammo for exotic weapons

Rifle (Smart).name: Karabin (Inteligentna)
Rifle (Smart).description: Req Targeting Scope Cyberware, otherwise won't fire. If miss single attack by 4 or less, roll second attack at same DV 1d10+10 (not normal stat). Can add luck. Target can dodge the second roll as normal if able to do so.

Rocket (Smart).name: Rakieta (Inteligentna)
Rocket (Smart).description: Req Targeting Scope Cyberware, otherwise won't fire. If miss single attack by 4 or less, roll second attack at same DV 1d10+10 (not normal stat). Can add luck. Target can dodge the second roll as normal if able to do so.

Shotgun Shell (Incendiary).name: Amunicja śrutowa (Podpalająca)
Shotgun Shell (Incendiary).description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Shotgun Slug (Expansive).name: Breneka (Dum-dum)
Shotgun Slug (Expansive).description: If you roll Foreign object Critical (see pg. 187), victim rolls for a second (different) Critical Injury. Second injury does not deal bonus damage.

Shotgun Slug (Incendiary).name: Breneka (Podpalająca)
Shotgun Slug (Incendiary).description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Shotgun Slug (Rubber).name: Breneka (Gumowa)
Shotgun Slug (Rubber).description: Does not cause Critical Injury. Does not ablate armor. Leaves target at minimum 1hp. Counts as Basic ammo for exotic weapons

Shotgun Slug (Smart).name: Breneka (Inteligentna)
Shotgun Slug (Smart).description: Req Targeting Scope Cyberware, otherwise won't fire. If miss single attack by 4 or less, roll second attack at same DV 1d10+10 (not normal stat). Can add luck. Target can dodge the second roll as normal if able to do so.

Very Heavy Pistol (Expansive).name: B. Ciężki pistolet (Dum-dum)
Very Heavy Pistol (Expansive).description: If you roll Foreign object Critical (see pg. 187), victim rolls for a second (different) Critical Injury. Second injury does not deal bonus damage.

Very Heavy Pistol (Incendiary).name: B. Ciężki pistolet (Podpalająca)
Very Heavy Pistol (Incendiary).description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.
